amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Department of Defense to conduct a demonstration program for enrolling Medicare-eligible military retirees in the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in part B of House Rept. 105-544 to authorize the Department of Defense to conduct a demonstration program for enrolling Medicare-eligible military retirees in the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program. Authorized funds would be offset by the sale of National Defense Stockpile materials.

action.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 1, 1 Present (Roll No. 178).
